data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Casablanca Settat, Morocco.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Casablanca Settat, Morocco
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Casablanca Settat, Morocco will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Father, grace the churches in Casablanca Settat, Morocco with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 6,848,749, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Deaf people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Casablanca Settat, Morocco.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Casablanca Settat do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Casablanca Settat, Morocco to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

location.name: Casablanca Settat
location.cities_list: Casablanca, Mohammedia, El Jadid, Settat, Berrechid
location.cities_list_w_pop: Casablanca (3,144,909), Mohammedia (187,708), El Jadid (147,549), Settat (119,082), Berrechid (93,954)
